DOC.brief_summary: The present study aims to evaluate the impact of a weaning strategy based on identification of early signs of respiratory distress by lung ultrasound and the consequent implementation of a "clinical optimization" protocol as compared to usual care.
DOC.brief_title: Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation Guided by Lung Ultrasound (Brazilian WEANLUS)
DOC.criteria: Mechanically ventilated >48h Moderate/Severe COPD Spinal cord lesion Neuromuscular disease (previous) Lung fibrosis Tracheostomy Heart failure (EF<50%) Lung/pleural cancer inadequate "window"for LUS
